parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: 1. Valid values: 1 to 100000.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 500. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

>  You can query data within the last seven days.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the callback is successful. Valid values:

*   success
*   failed

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream.
